title.value: UK Core Observation Vital Signs Head Circumference

description.value: Defines the additional constraints and extensions on the UK Core Observation Vital Signs profile, for recording the clinical observation of a patients head circumference.

purpose.value: To provide implementers with additional support when implementing measuring of head circumference and to provide a consistent structure to how the data is presented.
